034    private static void showForOverall() {

036        Threads.runAsynchronously(() -> showForNumberType(JavaNumberTypeSupport.DOUBLE, 100, 0.97f, 9));

043
044    private static <N extends Number> void showForNumberType(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport, int epochs, float learningRate, int m) {
045        Plot mrePlot = new Plot("RME " + " m=" + m + ", type=" + typeSupport.name());
046        mrePlot.display();
047
048        Plot fitPlot = new Plot("Fit " + " m=" + m + ", type=" + typeSupport.name());
049        fitPlot.display();
050
051        System.out.println("Type: " + typeSupport.name() + ", Learning rate: " + learningRate);
052        showForNumberType(typeSupport, epochs, learningRate, m, mrePlot, fitPlot);
053        Threads.sleepSilently(1_000);
054    }
055
056    private static <N extends Number> void showForNumberType(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport, int epochs, float learningRate, int m, Plot mrePlot, Plot fitPlot) {
057        LinearRegression<N> regression = createClosedSolutionFitting(typeSupport);
058        fitPlot.plotDataSet(regression.getTrainSet(), "Train Set");
059        fitPlot.redraw();
060        VanillaGradientDescentOptimizer<N> optimizer = (VanillaGradientDescentOptimizer<N>) regression.getOptimizer();
061        optimizer.setLearningRate(learningRate);
062        optimizer.setEpochs(epochs);
063        optimizer.setEpochCompletionListener(IterativeOptimizer.sample(100, rmePlotter(mrePlot, fitPlot, regression, learningRate)));
064        regression.fitComplexity(m);
065    }
066
067    private static synchronized <N extends Number> VanillaGradientDescentOptimizer.EpochCompletionListener<N> rmePlotter(Plot mrePlot, Plot fitPlot, LinearRegression<N> regression, float learningRate) {
068        return (epoch, model, trainSet, optimizer) -> {
069            fitPlot.plotTargetOutput(model, "Fit (" + learningRate + ")");
070            fitPlot.redraw();
071            Pair<Float, Map<String, Float>> currentRmes = regression.calculateRMEs(model);
072            mrePlot.addToSeries("Train RME (" + learningRate + ")", new float[]{epoch}, new float[]{currentRmes.left()});
073            for (Map.Entry<String, Float> currentRmeEntry : currentRmes.right().entrySet()) {
074                mrePlot.addToSeries(currentRmeEntry.getKey() + " RME (" + learningRate + ")", new float[]{epoch}, new float[]{currentRmeEntry.getValue()});
075            }
076            mrePlot.redraw();
077        };
078    }
079
080    private static <N extends Number> LinearRegression<N> createClosedSolutionFitting(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport) {
081        SyntheticDataSets.SyntheticDataSet<N> dataSetGenerator = SyntheticDataSets.sinus(typeSupport);
082        BasisFunction.Generator<N> basisFunctionGenerator = new PolynomialFunction.Generator<>(typeSupport);
083        return create(dataSetGenerator, basisFunctionGenerator);
084    }
085
086    public static <N extends Number> LinearRegression<N> create(SyntheticDataSets.SyntheticDataSet<N> dataSetGenerator, BasisFunction.Generator<N> basisFunctionGenerator) {
087        dataSetGenerator.setRandomSeed(165);
088        dataSetGenerator.setNoiseScale(1.0f);
089        DataSet<N> trainSet = dataSetGenerator.load(10);
090        DataSet<N> testSet = dataSetGenerator.load(10);
091        Map<String, DataSet<N>> testSets = new LinkedHashMap<>();
092        testSets.put("Test Set", testSet);
093        return new LinearRegression<>(basisFunctionGenerator, trainSet, testSets, new GradientDescentOptimizer<>(new VanillaGradientDescent<>(basisFunctionGenerator.getCurrentNumberType().valueOf(0.1f))), Regimes.batch());
094    }
095*/
